column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I will say this place is a nice
column2: hip place to meet at the bar and have some drinks.  It looked like alot of people were ready to hit the club.  That being said
column3: it was super loud in there witht he music.  It was hard to hold a conversation without yelling.  It is totally a non factor to me
column4: but just be aware.  I will definitely be coming back
